intro.description:
This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to add window images, add a splash screen and customize a launcher for an RCP application using PDE.
To learn more about using cheat sheets, click the help button in the top right corner (?).

item.title: Open the plug-in development perspective
item.description:
To open the plug-in development perspective, select Window->Open Perspective->Other... and choose Plug-in Development.
Alternatively, click the following button to perform the task.

item.title: Open the product editor
item.description:
To open the product editor (if it is not already open), expand the com.example.rcpapp tree dialog in the Package Explorer view and double-click on the rcpapp.product file (the Overview page should be open initially).
Alternatively, click the following button to perform the task.

item.title: Add window images
item.description: To add window images, perform the following steps:

subitem.label: Select the "Branding" tab within the product editor to display the "Branding" page
Click the "Browse" button adjacent to the "16x16" text box under the "Window Images" heading
Fully expand the "com.example.rcpapp" tree in the "Image Selection" dialog box and select "alt_window_16.gif" and click "OK"
Click the "Browse" button adjacent to the "32x32" text box under the "Window Images" heading
Fully expand the "com.example.rcpapp" tree in the "Image Selection" dialog box and select "alt_window_32.gif" and click "OK"
Select "File->Save" from the main menu

item.title: Test the RCP product
item.description: To test the RCP product, perform the following steps:

subitem.label: Select the "Overview" tab within the product editor to display the "Overview" page
Click the "Launch the product" hyperlink under the "Testing" heading
Note the image in the window title bar (if applicable on your platform)
Exit the RCP application

item.title: Add a splash screen
item.description: To add a splash screen, perform the following steps:

subitem.label: Select the "Branding" tab within the product editor to display the "Branding" page
Click the "Browse..." button adjacent to the "Plug-in" text box under the "Splash Screen" heading
Select the "com.example.rcpapp" entry in the "Plug-in Selection" dialog box and click "OK"
Select "File->Save" from the main menu
Note: Eclipse expects a file called "splash.bmp" to be located in the root of the specified plug-in
Locate the "splash.bmp" file located in the "icons" directory under the "com.example.rcpapp" project within the "Package Explorer view"
Right-click on the "splash.bmp" file and select "Refactor->Move..." from the context menu
Select "com.example.rcpapp" from the "Move" dialog box and click "OK"

item.title: Test the RCP product
item.description: To test the RCP product, perform the following steps:

subitem.label: Select the "Overview" tab within the product editor to display the "Overview" page
Click the "Launch the product" hyperlink under the "Testing" heading
Note the splash screen displayed before the RCP application window is visible
Exit the RCP application

item.title: Customize the launcher
item.description:
We will walk through this task assuming we are working on a Windows platform (Similar steps may be followed for other platforms).
To customize the launcher, perform the following steps:

subitem.label: Select the "Launcher" tab within the product editor to display the "Launcher" page
Input "rcpapp" into the "Launcher Name" text box under the "Program Launcher" heading
Select the "win32" tab under the "Program Launcher" heading
Select the "Use a single ICO file containing 7 images as specified above" radio button
Click the "Browse..." button adjacent to the "File" text box
Fully expand the "com.example.rcpapp" tree in the "Image Selection" dialog box and select "alt_launcher.ico" and click "OK"
Select "File->Save" from the main menu
